Uses of Interface
edu.luc.cs.trull.task.Task

Packages that use Task
edu.luc.cs.trull.demo.task Demonstrates some capabilities of the Trull Task framework (run timer demo run simple task demo run complex task demo).  
edu.luc.cs.trull.task Provides support for representing ongoing, autonomous activities as Trull components.  
 

Uses of Task in edu.luc.cs.trull.demo.task

 class Count
          A simple task that wastes some CPU cycles in each step.
 class ProgressTask
          A wrapper class for showing the progress of any task in a progress bar.
 class Timer
          A timer implemented as a Trull task.
